name: Addermarch Campaign - Session 6
tagline: in which the party faces a burrowing menace
shortSummary: In Roscombe and Fontwick, the party accepts Caradoc's uligium quest, tracks a burrowing menace, and slays an ankheg threatening a dairy farm.
longSummary: After a quiet market day in Roscombe, Drou, Fazoth, and Yvan meet with Caradoc, who commissions them to descend into nearby deep caverns to recover the rare living mineral uligium. They spend the next day buying rope, climbing gear, and supplies while gathering cave lore from Colette du Bois and other locals to locate the closest subterranean system. Traveling west toward Fontwick, they encounter distraught dairy farmers Samatha and Godfrey whose herd has been slaughtered by a massive burrowing insect. Samatha leads them back to her farm, where they keep watch through the night until an ankheg erupts from the pasture; synchronized witch bolts from Fazoth and Yvan, backed by Drou, bring it down before it can cause more harm. At dawn, Yvan gifts Samatha enough coin to replace her herd, and the grateful farmer provisions the adventurers as they continue toward the rumored deep caverns.

npcs.name: Samatha of Fontwick

npcs.name: Godfrey of Fontwick

npcs.name: Ankheg
